entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installing android emulator #13235
  • MAUI Android Flyout Manu: Opening the Flyout Menu programmatically does not work correctly. #13233
  • MAUI Search Bar on Android: Focus and Unfocus event handlers do not get called when extending the class and adding handlers in the constructor. #13227
    Backlog
  • No errors or warnings generated when svg cannot be parsed by Resizetizer/Svg2VectorDrawable #13226
    Backlog
  • VMware #13219
  • Hot reload Style Pointer problem #13218

Closed

  • RowDefinition Height incorrect #8194
  • "dotnet build" complains about missing nuget packages #12762
    Backlog
  • Implicit cast from Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.RectF to Android.Graphics.RectF returns wrong result #8165
    Backlog
  • [Bug] By default .NET MAUI Project doesn't target all Android ABIs #3011
  • Visual Studio for Mac 2022 17.3 Preview (17.3 build 198) - MAUI Solution and Project Name Mismatch #8008
  • NullReferenceException in `ShellToolbarAppearanceTracker.SetColors` on Android #12460
    Backlog
  • Maui App crashes on an android device when navigating to another page #12980
  • iOS: Publish failed with "_GenerateDSym" failure if specify "-o:{path to custom directory}" #13231
  • The same frame effect is written on different elements, but the design output is completely different. And now I want to know! #12650
    Backlog
  • Add Loaded lifecycle event #8683
    Backlog
  • Fix Entry "Next" search performance #13147
    8.0-preview2
  • Android - Setting TabPage Tab color causes System.NullRefException #12904
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Windows .NET MAUI App throws Exception when closing second window #12956
    Backlog
  • App crashes with second window and WebView #8323
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Application.Current.OpenWindow() creates a redundant instance of WebView #10436
    .NET 8 Planning
  • 创建新项目时，找不到“MAUI”选项 #13075
  • Maui Blazor App :in (release process: "ipa" file ) project crashes on showing a nuget control #13016
  • IImage.AsBytes() takes float quality 0..1 but complains about quality not being 0..100 when 50 is entered #12158
    Backlog
  • .NET Maui on dotnet 7.0 Windows platform (WindowsApplicationSDK 1.1.5) crashes with System.ExecutionEngineException in Application.Start in Main #11546

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't refresh the filtered tests if the filter hasn't actually changed #13236
  • [iOS/MacCatalyst] Fix Editor scrolling #13234
  • [core] `WeakEventManager+Subscription` needs `IEquatable` #13232
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [CI] Install the android and iOS dotnet version when they are diff to the maui one. #13228
  • [Resizetizer] Do not update images if they have not been updated. #13224
    area/single project ☝️
  • [Windows] Fix crash on Windows WebView updating the Html Source more than once #13222
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Use the launcher to start the camera #13220
    area/essentials 🍞

Merged

  • [build] use stable bits in main #13201
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix wrong conversions between Graphics RectF and Android RectF #13225
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Avoid to update Shell Toolbar colors if already disposed the Tracker #12539
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Align dash effect between Border and Shapes #12693
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [iOS] Better Find Next Textfield Algo #13174
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 8.0-preview2
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13217
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix crash setting SelectedTabColor on TabbedPage #12924
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/TabbedPage
  • Wire up WebView2 to window life cycle #13206
    area/controls 🎮
  • Add more tests for Graphics #13208
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Add NotNullWhen to IsAlive() #13214
  • Fix back button tap for older iOS APIs #13204

Updated

  • feat: Added nullable annotations for IValueConverter. #13173
    community ✨
  • Fix setting bottom tab icon title #12889
    area/shell 🐢
  • [MacOS/iOS] Fixed incorrect color of RadioButton in Dark Mode using Default Control Template. #13215
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Remove Compatibility packages by default #13165
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, backport/NO
  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #12890
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Fix issue with caching the page that holds unfocused control #13028
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #12910
  • When measuring FlexLayout unconstrained, allow child to be desired size #13216
    area/layout 🔲, layout-flex
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar focus issues #11698
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • "Rename" Windows' Graphics APIs to match with the rest of the platforms #12818
    t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Simplification of user interface declaration in code #12728
    proposal/open, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix issue rendering Button Background gradient with shadow #13022
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    area/modal
  • Fix shadow visibility on Windows #10996
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Housekeeping] Added pending changes in Android AlertManager #11989
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
